name: Munn Rabot
description: Munn Rabôt is a full-service advertising agency based in the Flatiron district of Manhattan. Unlike other agencies that isolate their staff inside divisions and job titles, Munn Rabôt breaks down the walls literally. We work in an open loft space where creative can reach right over to media, and media can speak directly to account service. Over the years we have been fortunate to work for a variety of clients.
